name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Dynamic Senior Field Engineer with 8 years of experience in delivering cutting-edge solutions within the automotive sector. Proficient in **C/C++**, **Python**, **Java**, and **.NET**, with expertise in **AUTOSAR**, **In-Vehicle Networking**, and effective Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) practices. Demonstrated knowledge in implementing **Threading**, **UDP**, and **Multicast** techniques while ensuring adherence to **OSI Layer** standards, along with experience in **Routing** and **VLANs** configurations.

I bring a strong background in **Embedded Systems** development and a solid understanding of **DDS** and **SOME/IP** protocols. Additionally, I have successfully worked with virtualization technologies and **Hypervisors** to create efficient environments for software deployment. I excel in **Cloud-Native** architectures and **Web Services**, utilizing best practices in secure application development. My commitment to leveraging advanced technologies ensures high-quality, scalable, and maintainable solutions.
